r.s: An extension to create PostScript files
r.d: ps is an extension similar to the pdf extension but for creating PostScript files. Its api is modelled after the pdf extension.
r.n: Reenablee reading of gd images. Added configuration file for win32. New example to list all glyphs in a font. New examples for creating Type3 fonts and postscript files in memory. Tests for more image types in example/image.php. Added new functions to create Type3 fonts and to modify kerning and ligatures of an existing font. Added new function ps_glyph_name() and ps_glyph_show(). New function ps_include_file().
